CustomField.description: Enable this setting to prevent users from being auto-provisioned with an Adobe user account when they send or manage agreements. This setting does not prevent auto-provisioning of users that occurs when Update Agreement is clicked from the Agreement list.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enable this setting to prevent users from being auto-provisioned with an Adobe user account when they send or manage agreements. This setting does not prevent auto-provisioning of users that occurs when Update Agreement is clicked from the Agreement list.
CustomField.label: Disable User Provisioning
